wblut.geom

Class WB_IndexedTriangle2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.geom.WB_IndexedTriangle2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WB_Triangle2D

    public class WB_IndexedTriangle2D
extends java.lang.Object
implements WB_Triangle2D
    A subclass of WB_Triangle referencing points as array indices.
